Warranty & Support

Price: $42.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:47:03 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Wireless Charger & Car Holder 2 in 1 Design for Safer Driving, Drivers Focus More on Driving

1. The 2-in-1 design will help you to end the chaos of cable and resolve your panic of low cellphone power when frequently using a GPS navigator, voice call, or listening to music on the road.

2. Auto-Opening and auto Clamping: Just place your phone in, it will auto clamping and auto-adjusting your phone to the best charging area, no manual operation required.

3. You can charge your phone, glance at your GPS, receive hands-free calls and keep your eyes on the road, which will make your driving safer and more convenient.

4. The flexible gooseneck and a 360° ball joint ensures you get the most comfortable and safest viewing without neck or eye strains while charging your phone.

What is the biggest advantage of this wireless car charger?

Our car charger mount will intelligently identify your phone and automatically detect the location of your mobile phone charging coil, then it will auto-adjusting the phone to the best charging area, which avoids the problem of manual adjustment that maybe not the best charging area, it will improve the charging efficiency.

FAQ

Why this suction cup won’t stay or be attached to the dash?

1. Please use the Anti-shake Stabilizer on the irregular surface of the dashboard.

2. Before placing the product on the dashboard, you need to turn the button on, then press the suction cup where you want it to be, and finally buckle the button.

3. Rinsing and air drying the suction cup and pad after using for a long time can restore their stickiness.

Why does this wireless car charger charge slow or not charging?

1. Make sure that your phone supports the wireless charging function. Otherwise, wireless charging cannot be realized.

2. Please remove the thick, uneven or rugged case, metal ring holder, metal attachments and credit cards for optimal charging. Be sure your phone case is NOT thicker than 5mm.

3. Before using the phone wireless charger, please use the provided USB cable to connect the phone mount to QC3.0/QC2.0 charging port to connect the power. Other adapter or USB Port doesn’t support fast charging and can not supply enough power to this car phone holder mount charger, QC3.0 charger is recommended for high charging efficiency

4. GPS navigation or playing music may have an impact on the charging speed, the rate of battery consumption may be higher than the charging.

5. Please notice: Any wireless charging is not as fast as wired charging, which is not the defect of this wireless car charger.

Sliding Cover Design to Protect Phone

The sliding cover will move along with the phone when open or close the phone mount, which can protect your phone from being scratched.

Silicone Slot for Protecting Phone Buttons

The slot design can prevent your phone buttons from being clamped. And Silicone protects your phone from being scratched.

One-Hand Operation

The arms will auto-opening after connecting the power, and auto-clamping once place the phone in. You also can touch the side button to close/open the arms.

Latest Upgraded Chip

Use the latest upgraded chip technology to achieve automatic precise alignment, which can be operated with one hand and make driving easier and safer.

360° Adjustable Car Mount

The car phone holder is offered as a dashboard mount and windshield mount, a flexible 360° ball joint ensures you get the most comfortable and safest viewing without neck or eye strains while charging your phone, also making phone calls and GPS navigation more convenient than ever.

Release Your Phone after Power Off

Built-in Super Capacitor. You could still touch the release buttons 2-3 times after power off, no more worries if you forget to take your phone out of the mount when the car is shut off.

【Automatic Precise Alignment】This car phone mount is a built-in advanced sensor, just place your phone in after power on, it will intelligent identify and auto-adjusting the phone to the best charging area according to your phone model, no need to manually adjust the foot.
【Wide Compatibility】This wireless car charger mount can compatible with all wireless charging phones.15W Wireless Fast Charging for LG V50/V40/V30/G8 /G7; 10W for Samsung Galaxy S22/S21/ S21+/ S21 ultra/S20+/S20/Note 20/Note 20 Ultra/Note 10+/Note 10/S10+; 7.5W for iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 pro/ 12 Pro Max/12 Pro/12/11 /11 Pro /11 Pro Max /SE /XS /X/XR/8 Plus/8; 5W standard wireless charging for other Phones.
【Case Friendly & FOD FUNCTION】This car wireless charger supports charging through phone cases up to 5mm thick.FOD foreign body detection prevents abnormal charging of equipment, please remove metal/magnetic objects, credit cards or pop holders before charging.
【Won’t Block View for Safer Driving】Shapes the flexible gooseneck according to your driving habits for better use to make phone calls and GPS navigation more convenient than ever. Drivers will be safer and more comfortable with this car wireless charger!
【2 In 1 Design】: Combines the wireless charger & car mount, offers fast charging for your phone and saves you from messing with cables and cases while driving.

NOTE: NOT RECOMMENDED TO USE THE EXTRA DASHBOARD PAD FOR WINDSHIELD MOUNTING
Broad Vision: Qifutan cell phone car mount features a 16cm/6.2in aluminum long gooseneck that sends your phone much closer to you. It can be mounted on the dashboard or windshield firmly. Most importantly, you can bend it in every direction to avoid obstructing the view
Secure Steady Installation: Qifutan car mount for iphone 13/12/11 features an extra-strong vacuum suction cup with a layer of super sticky gel, a locking lever, and an anti-shake stabilizer. It sticks securely and easily on the dashboard or most flat surfaces and removes the phone car mount without leaving any nasty marks. (Note: use warm water to wash the car holder’s suction cup if the surface is dirty or it can not stick firmly, then let it air dry.)
One-Hand Operation: Press the button on the lower back of the car mobile phone holder to take out your phone, and press the back edge of the clamping arms to secure your phone with one hand. Make your operation more fluently. Fit well for the smartphone which’s the width between 4”-7”in and the most thickness
Smooth Contact: The car phone mount is padded with multiple soft silicone pads to avoid scratching your smartphone or other devices. Perfect choice for most cars, vehicle, pickup trucks, SUVs, trucks, taxis; a good assistant for Uber, Lyft drivers
Ideal Viewing Angle: The car phone mount features a 360° rotating ball joint that allows you to switch it from portrait to landscape view quickly, for getting the best viewing angle. It is favorable for navigation and sending and receiving phone calls. You can enjoy a more convenient and secure drive

Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)



Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshield
Foldable Design For Easy Storage – When done using, just click the locking latch and pop the sun blocker shut into its compact size to easily store it in the dashboard, door panel or even under the seat without taking up any extra space
Sunshade Umbrella For Most Vehicles – The retractable shade collapses to less than 1 square foot instantly, and its universal size works equally well with the windshields of trucks, cars or even SUVs
Protect Your Car’s Interior – This car window cover is designed to block intense heat and harmful UV rays from the sun to help keep the inside of your car cooler, while preventing the car seats, upholstery and dashboard from fading and cracking
Privacy & Safety – The sun blocking screen provides shade to your car, truck, SUV or RV whether you are driving to work or halting mid-way on the road. It keeps your vehicle at a safe temperature while also maintaining complete privacy

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and won’t scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and won’t rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: ●Interior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. ●Exterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. ●Fog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. ●Stubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. ●No chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

Read more

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads

–

  • Made of microfiber material can remove more dust and dirt, easy to clean, washable, and reusable.
  • The Windshield Cleaning Tool Kit includes:
  • 1 * Car Windshield Cleaner
  • 3 * Microfiber Bonnets
  • 1 * Empty Spray Bottle

Exclusive tension spring arching technology creates a fit that’s custom-contoured to the curvature of each side of the windshield. Wiper blades are designed without brackets or hinges, offering improved design and performance over conventional wiper blades.
Easy Installation: This 22 Inch Wiper Blade Pair Is Easy To Install For A Quick Diy Wiper Blade Replacement. These Blades Conform Snugly Onto The Curves Of The Windshield For A Superior Fit. Instructions Included
Clean, Crisp And Clear: Experience An Ultra Clean And A Streak Free Windshield With Trico Windshield Wipers 22 Inch. These Automotive Replacement Wipers Can Withstand Rain, Wind, Snow, Mud, Dust, Or Any Other Debris That Might Hamper Your Windshield’S Visibility
Optimal Visibility: Sleek Aerodynamic Design Withstand Tough Winds And Decreases Wind Lift For The Utmost Visibility During Driving. Driver Windshield Wipers Also Reduce Snow Clogging For A Clear And Drier View
Close Contact Curvature: Receive The Closest Contact With Our Memory Curved Steel Beam Style. Intimate Contact Allows These Wiper Blades To Perform Effortlessly To Remove As Much Outside Extremities

Read more

TRICO Gold All-Weather Premium Beam Blades

TRICO Gold wiper blades are all-weather beam blades that are a step-up from the average, conventional wiper blade. They feature a beam blade design and come with our Swift Easy Connection Technology that allows for quick and easy installation. When shopping, make sure you have your specific vehicle selected before purchasing. These Twin Packs come with both driver side and passenger side wiper blades which ensures you are getting the correct fit each and every time.

Read more

Wiper Blade Features and Benefits

Reduced Wind-lift and Clogging

Low-profile, stylish design reduces clogging from ice during the winter months and reduces wind-lift for optimum visibility and performance while driving.

Better Fit for Modern Day Windshields

Beam blade design allows for the wiper blade to better conform to today’s curved windshields. The more coverage and contact the wiper blade can get with the windshield, the better the wiper blade will perform.

Tested Tough

Tested to last over 1,500,000 cycles.

Hassle-free Instillation

Quick and easy installation.

Product Description

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Tool：

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

Application of Auto Windshield Cleaning Tool :

1. Car windshield cleaner tool are great works as a fog & moisture removal tool.

2. Windshield cleaner tool /car window cleaner tool is also an ideal tool for home cleaning.

3. The car windshield cleaner is great for clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks

4. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.

Windshield Inside Cleaning Tool Specifications:

Material: Aluminum Alloy / Plastic ( ABS ), Microfiber

Brush Length: 63.98cm / 25.19 inch

Brush Head: 15 x 10cm / 5.9 x 3.9 inch

Triangular Brush Head: 13 x 14.5cm / 5.1 x 5.7 inch

Maximum Flip Angle: 180°

Covers Head Color: Yellow, Grey, Blue

Reusable Microfiber Pads：

Car windshield cleaner tool come come with 4pcs washable & reusable cloth (2x yellow+1x grey+1x blue), they are made of microfiber fine fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective, and never cause streaking after cleaning.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Install Instruction:

1. Hold the ergonomic non-slip part with one hand(Note: Don’t wear the ergonomic side upside, it should be downside install).

2. Hold the bottom of windshield cleaner with one hand and hold the top of the handle with the other hand, turn left the long handle to extend the handle.

3. Hold the middle black part and hold the handle with the other hand and than turn right to tightened it.

4. Use two finger to hold the cylindrical button, slowly push in to install the handle.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Package Includes:

1 X Extendable Handle

1X Detachable Rectangle Panel

1X Detachable Triangle Panel

4 X Microfiber Cloth (2pcs Yellow+1pcs Grey+1pcs Blue)

1 X Empty Bottle

【High Quality】The handle of the windshield cleaning tool is made of aluminum alloy material, sturdy and reliable, not easy to break and deform. And comes with 4pcs washable & reusable pads (2xyellow + 1xgrey + 1xblue) the cloth that are made of strong water absorption coral fleece fabricty never causes streaking after cleaning.
【180° Rotating Head Design】Our car window cleaner designed with 180° Pivoting& Rotating Head-helps to provide better leverage and full contact to all surfaces to remove troublesome gunk in the corner of windshield, ideal for car interior & exterior cleaning.
【Easy to Use】The windshield cleaner with the extendable handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. Do not need any soap to clean the pads, just only water, it would be clean the fogs, stains, dust ,dirt on the glass, even clean the windshield corner easily!
【Multiple Uses】Car windshield cleaner tool is an ideal choice for dehumidification and demisting of windshield glass. Our inside windshield cleaner tool come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks, and also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls, to meet your different household cleaning needs.
【Package Includes】Our windshield cleaning tool inside come with 1pcs extendable handle and 2pcs detachable panel (1pcs square panel+1pcs triangle panel ) and 4pcs microfiber cover cloths (2pcs yellow+1pcs grey+1pcs blue) and a small spray bottle.

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Tool：

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Price: $17.99 - $16.57
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:19:53 UTC – Details)


Outsmart the Elements with Rain-X! No other wipers deliver the innovation and technology that is offered by Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades. These unique blades apply a patented Rain-X water repellent directly onto your windshield for you. The repellent is transferred from the squeegee to the glass – and the magic of Rain-X is activated! Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades feature advanced beam technology designed to hug your windshield for maximum contact and superior wipe quality. These 2-in-1 wiper blades both clear and repel the elements to provide superior driving visibility. Compared to traditional wiper blades, the difference is amazing! For optimal water repellency activation, run your wiper blades on a clean, dry windshield for 2 minutes. Once activated, the water repelling action will last for months! If you need additional help with determining the right wiper blade size for your car, reference our Blade Finder or Amazon’s Confirmed Fit program. If you need help with installing your new wiper blades, installation videos can be found by scanning the QR code on the back of your wiper blade’s packaging.
Patented Water Repellent Formula – This 2-In-1 Wiper Blade Plus Rain Repellent Applies Patented Rain X Water Repellent Directly To Your Windshield, Both Clearing And Repelling The Elements
Superior Driving Visibility And Safety – Watch Water Magically Bead Up And Roll Off Your Windshield While You Drive, Providing You With Superior All-Weather Driving Visibility, Safety, And Comfort
Easy Installation And Universal Fit – The Rain-X Universal Adapter Is Easy To Use And Fits 96% Of Vehicles. Scan The QR Code On The Back Of The Package For Installation Videos
Advanced Beam Wiper Blade Technology – Provides Uniform Pressure Points Along The Length Of The Blade, Allowing It To Hug The Curvature Of The Windshield For A Smooth, Clean Wipe
Ultimate All-Weather Performance – Designed To Clear Your Windshield In Extreme Weather Conditions, Such As Ice, Snow, And Sleet Delivering Longer-Lasting, Superior Wipe Performance

Read more

Imagine there were wiper blades that did More than just wipe away the rain…

Introducing Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades. These revolutionary 2-in-1 wiper blades provide an innovative solution to both clear and repel the elements for ultimate driving visibility. In addition to the wipe quality you’ve come to expect from Rain-X, these wipers now also treat your windshield with a water repelling coating so water magically beads up and rolls away while you drive!

Our innovation was Voted one of the #1 by consumers!*

Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency blades work by transferring a Rain-X water repelling coating from the wiper squeegee to the windshield during initial use. The Rain-X water repelling coating will also help clear your windshield of harsh winter weather driving elements, such as ice, snow and sleet. Outsmart the Elements with Rain-X.

*Winner Car Care Category, 2017. Survey of 40,000 people by Kantar TNS.

For Optimal Water Repelling Results:

  • Ensure windshield is clean and dry.
  • Install wiper blades. Remove yellow plastic wiper cover after installation and prior to first use.
  • Turn on the wiper blades and wipe dry at the medium speed for 2 to 3 minutes.
  • Spray washer fluid briefly and water repellency is activated.
  • The water repellency will activate with normal blade use in wet conditions, but requires more time.

Read more

Key Benefits

Experience True Innovation with the 2017 Product of the Year

Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades apply a Rain-X water repellent coating to your windshield.

Water Repelling Technology

Once activated, the Rain-X water repelling technology applied to the windshield, lasts for months. Watch water magically bead up and roll off your windshield while you drive!

Ultimate Driving Visibility

This 2-IN-1 wiper blade + rain repellent both clear and repel the elements for ultimate driving visibility. Notice the difference in visibility between the glass area treated by the Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency wiper blades vs. the area not reached.

Ease of Installation

The Rain-X universal adapter is easy to use and fits 96% of vehicles. Install at home in minutes! Installation videos are available on the Rain-X Brand Store under Wiper Blades.

Read more


Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency
Rain-X Fusion
Rain-X Weatherbeater
Product Description Rain X Latitude Water Repellency is an innovative 2-in-1 Wiper Blade + Rain Repellent that applies a Rain-X water repellent coating to the windshield Rain X Fusion is the perfect upgrade from traditional wipers; featuring a sleek, heavy-duty exterior casing The original Rain-X Wiper Blade, introduced in 2001. For over 15 years, this traditional wiper blade is still known for its quality and durability
Key Benefit Applies Rain-X water repellency technology to the windshield which causes water to bead up and roll away while driving An aerodynamic, heavy-duty design ensures excellent visibility in any weather driving condition Sturdy, galvanized all-steel frame, traditional wiper blade improves visibility

Design and Wipe Attributes Advanced, beam technology contours to the curvature of the windshield for a smooth, virtually streak-free wipe Sleek, modern design for improved windshield contact and a smooth, virtually streak-free wipe Utilizes all-steel frame with multiple pressure points for a quality wipe
Water Repellency Technology for the Ultimate in Driving Visibility

Product Description

Tevlaphee Windshield Cover

Tevlaphee windshield cover protects your vehicle from snow/ice/frost, save your time and efforts in winter morning, avoid scraper risk on the windshield.

You Need Tevlaphee Windsshield Cover To Solve These Problems!

Easy to Use!

Easy to Clean

The dust on the windshield cover can be easily removed with a damp cloth.

3 PCS Magnet

Tevlaphee car windscreen cover can be fixed in front of the window. Because the magnet is contained in the material, it will not scratch your car.

LONGER Size

Lengthen size protects entire windshield plus wipers, avoid damaged , save repair or replacement cost of wipers.

STABLE & SECURITY

2 side flaps close inside the car, anti-thief.

Made of 4 layers:

PEVA Aluminum Foil, flame retardant cotton, Composite Cotton, Soft Non-Woven Lining. Temperature-resistant, fire-retardant, tear-proof, scratch-resistant, robust and durable.

Foldable and Portable:

It can be folded without taking up space and being easy to carry.

Material: 4 Layers Material

Color:Silver/Black

Size:193 x 126cm（Suitable for most vehicles）

Package includes:

1 x Car Windshield Cover

1 x Storage Bag

EASY TO INSTALL

1. Secure the flaps with the door closed.

2. Hang both of the elastic bands on wing mirrors.

3. Completed.

Suitable For All Seasons

Aluminum foil surface layer and high quality flame retardant cotton inside to keep your car front window away from frost and dust in spring, UV rays in summer, leaves in autumn and snow or ice in winter. Not only can it reduces the time spent scrapping ice or snow, but also give you a clear car front screen.

Multi-Functional

With its ultra-thick design, it also can be used as camping table mats, yoga mats, tent mattress, pet car mats, and baby crawling mat at the outdoors.

【UPGRADED MATERIAL】Our car windshield cover have four layers which contains PEVA aluminum foil, needle punched cotton, silk cotton and non-woven material, which is resistant to high temperatures and tears, and can be better kept warm, anti-snow and anti-freeze.
【STASBLE WINDSHILED COVER】3 pcs updated magnet (15mm * 6mm) holds strongly on the windshield, no scratches arise in any case because the magnets are covered with cloth; side Wings pinched in the doors, theft protection; Rubber bands on the side mirrors;These 3 designs keep the windshield cover stable on the car, even in strong winds.
【WIND AND SNOW PROTECTION】 Aluminum foil and cotton padding can effectively prevent heat and water and wind and snow, help you prevent snow in front of the window,eliminating the need to defrost your window every morning,effectively reduces fuel expense,keep the windshield Clean & Clear,help blocking the car wiper area from filling with leaves and pine needles.
【EASY TO CARRY】 The Windshield Cover is soft and foldable, easy to install and easy to use. When you don’t need to use it, it can be easily folded and placed in the corner of the car, which is very convenient and saves space.Upgrade your driving experience with this must-have winter car accessory. Order now!
【UNIVERSAL SIZE FOR MOST CARS】 Universal Size for Most Car’s Windshield. The expanded size 73*61.8*49.6 in(193*157*126 CM)fits for most vehicles. Note: It does not fit on rear windows! *If you have any problems or questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We will give our best service for you.
